snippet: When the Scouts survey current members regarding their policies on gays and lesbians, will they get a useful result, or an “amen” from the choir?
abstract: When the Scouts survey current members regarding their policies on gays and lesbians, will they get a useful result, or an “amen” from the choir?

headline.main: For Boy Scouts' Parents, a Chance to Weigh In on Ban on Gays
